Package learn

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IRCSearchResult
    Represents a search result for a given feature
    IRCSearchSpace
    A search space to find features with a matching classification
    IRCSearchSpaceFactory
    Factory for creating search spaces
    IRelationClassifier
    A classifier which can predict a relation for given entities.
    IRelationClassifierFactory
    A factory for creating new relation classifier
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BayesRelationClassifier
    A relation classifier.
    BayesRelationFactory
    A factory for a bayes relation classifier
    DistantScaledResult
    A decorator for IRCSearchResults.
    RCDefaultFactory
    A default implementation for the RCSearchSpaceFactory
    RCDefaultSpace
    A default implementation for the RCSearchSpace It is based on k Nearest Neighbours as search approach
    RCModel
    A base model which manages different search spaces for different input categories,
    RelationTrainPipe
    A pipe which allows to train a given relation classifier.
    TrainingDataPipe
    A pipe which transforms labelled entities to training data for the relation classifier
    VotingRelationClassifier
    A relation classifier.
    VotingRelationFactory
    A factory to create voting classifier for relation extraction
